[#slope-class_site-visit]
====== Site visit

[frame=none, cols="1,5"]
|===
|Property | Value

|Identifier | `urn:shapes:plot-description:slope-class:site-visit`
|Label | Site visit
|Definition | Observations _MUST_ have a value for `tern:hasSiteVisit`.
|Comment | Observations following the Plot Description are made in the context of a site visit.
include::../../../statuses/submitted.adoc[]
|Conformance Classes | `TBA`

|Source | TERN Ecosystem Surveillance Ecological Monitoring Protocols
